attributes.action: Threaten Iran with military action if we dont get our soldiers back before a specific deadline.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country has been walked all over far to many times, what Iran is doing is just another indication that the rest of the world thinks are country is weak and we dont stand up for ourselves. We should give Iran a 48 hr deadline to give our soldiers back before we take military action against them.
BRITISH ARMYS MOTTO: BE THE BEST, well prove it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
